node.statement: MARKOV CHAIN CONSTRUCTION: Define a continuous-time Markov chain on S_n(lambda) via the inhomogeneous multispecies t-PushTASEP: at each site i of the ring, a clock rings at rate 1/x_i; when it rings, the particle at site i pushes into the next weaker particle clockwise, displacing it with probability (1-t) or continuing with probability t. Transition rates depend only on local species comparisons, site parameters x_i, and t.
